Package com.capricorn.ResponseController

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IClientController
    Form an IClientController interface
    IMessageHandler
    Interface is designed to handle the message from the server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardResponse
    From the server, after receiving the board message response which contains all the information we need in the board, the refresh the board.
    ConnectResponseController
    After ask for the server to be connected and the server reply with the response with the connction message.
    ControllerChain
    Form an abstract class ControllerChain without main method implement the interface IClientController.
    EmptyHandler
    Method of exception handling with condition no response.
    ExitGameResponse
    Exit game response from the server and quit the game if the response is legal.
    FindWordResponse
    Find word response tell the word submitted is legal or not.
    JoinGameResponse
    Join game response.
    LockGameResponse
    Receive and find out the lock game response from the server and realize the lock request.
    ResetGameResponse
    Controller is designed to process the message and find the ResetGameResponse response.
    SampleClientMessageHandler
    Sample implementation of a protocol handler to respond to messages received from the server.
